title: Remake resulted in -18 LP
body:
I need help from Riot to fix this issue:
I had this game and Wukong could not change the summoner spells before game started.
So he left the game in order for the rest of his teammates, including myself, to remake the game. 
At 3min mark, I voted Yes for the remake. 

However, the remake resulted in -18LP for no reason. 

Please help me to fix this issue. 

Thank you

replies.body:
Hey there, a remake shouldn't impact anyone except those marked as a leaver.  In this case, it looks like nobody in your team participated in the match so everyone on your team was marked as a leaver.  The system in that case applied a loss for the team.  I'm not sure that we can do anything about this because we have no way to adjust game stats or LP without breaking the system.  The system is also clear that anyone not participating would have been marked as a leaver.  The best preventative measure would have been for the team to continue playing while waiting to remake.

I think this is an interesting case, though, and worth bringing up to our devs as /remake feedback.  I'll share this interesting match, but you may want to post about it on [gameplay ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards as well.  Sorry about that.  :(
